reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. LANGSTON v. STATE, 477 So.2d 697 (La. 1985)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. JOHN LANGSTON v. STATE OF LOUISIANA.

opinion.posture: In re Langston, John; applying for remedial writ; Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court, Div. "H", No. 309,967.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Granted. The Criminal District Court, Section H, is ordered to comply with the previous order of this Court without unnecessary delay.
